name: 911 What's Your Emergency
description: In a very bizarre town, you must act as its 911 dispatcher. With limited resources you must talk to different characters and figure out whether they might need police, medical attention, the fire department, or maybe they just want someone to vent to. Oh did I mention that you are also just an intern? Well good luck doing all the other chores of the office while ensuring the people of this city don't all die.
